I must have.

::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::

    They all fired their weapo=
ns at the raptor, and the were to the front of him, the left and the right.=
 Each 4 times.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 11:54 AM
  Subje=
ct: Fw: Dachande did you forget?


  heres the last post I have for the fig=
ht between Razor Claw and Wolveritron.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fr=
om: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 12, =
2001 7:31 AM
  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


  Razor Claw glared =
at the three opponents with hate in his eyes and drool dripping from his ja=
w. The raptor no longer had control of his actions and wouldn't be stopped =
until justice had been served. "You fear me." He states through a half clos=
ed mouth. 

  He looked back at his origional prey, "You fear me so much th=
at you will not fight one on one." He took a few steps forward lowering his=
 head to the level of Wolveritron so they could look eye to eye. The anger =
and hatred split the air as the two looked toward each other. The teeth of =
one and the claws of the acused reflected in the light around. Two bots ent=
er, one bot leaves and if Razor Claw had his way the Wolverine in bot mode =
would be the apetizer.


    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dachan=
de 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 6:3=
0 AM
    Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


    ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/=
Ramus::

        "I fight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said. "Because you tic=
ked me off."
        Eclipse transformed to his full out battle mode, stand=
ing at nine feet tall. His claws extended to their full length, 5 inches. H=
is teeth were gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid on them.
       =
 Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor Claw.
        "We're re=
ady for ya," They said. They would not make the first move, though.
      -=
---- Original Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, February 11, 2001 9:38 AM
      Subject: Re=
: Dachande respond or else


      Razor Claw rolled out the busted windshi=
eld using the tuck and roll technique to avoid excessive damage. 

      "Y=
ou decide to fight after all I see." the raptor yells in his rage. he charg=
es forward biting at Wolveritron. "You fight me now, after leaving your tea=
m to fight alone? I will kill you slowly."


        ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
        From: dachande 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
       =
 Sent: Saturday, February 10, 2001 7:47 AM
        Subject: Re: Dachande re=
spond or else


        He is.

        ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::

    =
        His claws dropped from his hands. "Who said I'm lettin others fight=
 for me, Bub?"
            "Wolveritron, this is what he wants," Eclipse sa=
id, putting his hand out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't give it to him."=

            "Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolveritron said.
           =
 Ramus pulled his energy crossbow out (He's a twin of Ramulus). "I have no =
problem giving him what he wants."
            He didn't fire though.
     =

bject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
